00002 
00003 process = cms.Process("PROD")
00004 
00005 process.maxEvents = cms.untracked.PSet( input = cms.untracked.int32(-1) )
00006 
00007 process.DQMStore = cms.Service("DQMStore")
00008 
00009 process.tester = cms.EDAnalyzer("SMDQMClientExample")
00010 process.pDQM = cms.Path(process.tester)
00011

00013                             sourceURL = cms.untracked.string('http://srv-C2D05-05:51001/urn:xdaq-application:lid=30'),
